text:
An Error Occurrs while copy a document with a doc-id with a dash in it. lenya
interprets the part after the dash as a number and wants to increase it.
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 15620
this patch solves the dash-problem
creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
andreas@apache.org
text:
Patch applied to BRANCH_2_1_X (LCR 209824).
Please leave the bug open until the issue is resolved in 1.4 as well.
I applied the patch to 1.4-dev too.
creator: andreas@apache.org
